patterns: how many courses are there in this college
responses:
ITM Univesity Gwalior provides you courses in various programmes.

Followings are:

1. Diploma Programmes

2. Graduate Programmes

3. PG Programmes

patterns: how long will be B.Tech CSE course
how long will it take to complete B.Tech CSE course
responses: Our college offers 4 year long B.Tech CSE course.

patterns: what is the location of the college
responses: ITM University is located in Turari village near to the Gwalior.

patterns: how many semesters are there in a year
how many semesters one should study in a year
responses: There are two semesters in a year.

patterns: how many months are there in a semester
how long will be a single semester
responses: The single semester will be around 4-5 months.

patterns: what are the student requirements for admission
responses:
You should have atleast 60% marks in 10th standard and 70% marks in 12th standard to be eligible to take admission here.
 Also you have to clear our ITMNEST exam.

patterns: how many classes will be there in a day
responses: There may be four or five classes per day. Each class will be of 50 minutes.

patterns: what is the teaching style of this college?
Is the teaching pattern different from other college?
responses:
Our college has different teaching patterns than other colleges of Gwalior. We adopt a British teaching methodology, following the LTW techniques which stands for Lecture, Tutorial and Workshop.
You can provide us with your contact details and our counselors shall reach out to you and provide you with further details.
There are assignments every week which carry more weight than your written exams. The assignments have deadlines which you should not exceed if you want to get better marks.
You can message us here at any hours. But our college premises will be open from 9:00 am to 5:00 pm only.

patterns: will there be any extra curriculum activities?
does the college conducts any fun program
responses:
Yes, Of course. Our college not only provides excellent education but also encourage students to take part in different curriculum activities. The college conducts yearly programs like Sports meet, Annual fest, Carnival, Holi festival, and Christmas. 
 Also our college has basketball court, cricket & football ground, badminton court, table tennis, chess, carrom board and many more refreshment zones.

patterns: what facilities are provided by the college?
what are the facilities of college for students
responses: With excellent education facilities, Our College provides various other facilities like 24 hours internet, library, classes with AC, discusson room, canteen, parking space, and student service for any students queries.
